content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS 
(
	SELECT * 
	FROM sys.external_data_sources 
	WHERE name = 'silver_southridgedatalake02_dfs_core_windows_net'
) 
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [silver_southridgedatalake02_dfs_core_windows_net] 
WITH 
(
	LOCATION = 'abfss://silver@southridgedatalake02.dfs.core.windows.net' 
)
GO
